DefaultPayload.description: default payload for object for all HTTP codes that are not covered individually
DefaultPayload.title: DefaultPayload

google_analytics_account_email.description: Keep email in case user delete his social auth connection

actions.title: getProjectAnalyses
actions.description: List all analyses for a project

actions.title: getAnalysisSummary
actions.description: Get an Analysis detail

actions.title: getCrawlStatistics
actions.description: Return global statistics for an analysis

actions.title: getCrawlStatisticsByFrequency
actions.description: Return crawl statistics grouped by time frequency (1 min, 5 mins or 60 min) for an analysis

limit.description: max number of elements to retrieve

actions.title: getCrawlStatisticsUrls
actions.description: Return a list of 1000 latest URLs crawled (all crawled URLs or only URLS with HTTP errors)

list_type.description: URLs list type (crawled URLs or error URLs)

actions.title: getGanalyticsOrphanURLs
actions.description: Legacy    List of Orphan URLs. URLs which generated visits from the selected source according to Google Analytics data, but were not crawled with by the Botify crawler (either because no links to them were found on the website, or because the crawler was not allowed to follow these links according to the project settings).   For a search engine (medium: origanic; sources: all, aol, ask, baidu, bing, google, naver, yahoo, yandex) or a social network (medium: social; sources: all, facebook, google+, linkedin, pinterest, reddit, tumblr, twitter)

medium.description: Type of traffic, value: 'organic' (from search engine)or 'social' (from a social network)

source.description: Traffic source, value: name of the search engine or social network

actions.title: getLinksPercentiles
actions.description: Get inlinks percentiles

actions.title: getPageRankLost
actions.description: Lost pagerank

actions.title: getSitemapsReport
actions.description: Get global information of the sitemaps found (sitemaps indexes, invalid sitemaps urls, etc.)

actions.title: getSitemapsSamplesOutOfConfig
actions.description: Sample list of URLs which were found in your sitemaps but outside of the crawl perimeter defined for the project, for instance domain/subdomain or protocol (HTTP/HTTPS) not allowed in the crawl settings.

actions.title: getSitemapsSamplesSitemapsOnly
actions.description: Sample list of URLs which were found in your sitemaps, within the project allowed scope (allowed domains/subdomains/protocols), but not found by the Botify crawler.

actions.title: getLinksTopDomains
actions.description: Top domains

actions.title: getLinksTopSubdomains
actions.description: Top subddomains

actions.title: getVisitsOrphanURLs
actions.description: List of Orphan URLs. URLs which generated visits from the selected source according to Google Analytics data, but were not crawled with by the Botify crawler (either because no links to them were found on the website, or because the crawler was not allowed to follow these links according to the project settings).   For a search engine (medium: origanic; sources: all, aol, ask, baidu, bing, google, naver, yahoo, yandex) or a social network (medium: social; sources: all, facebook, google+, linkedin, pinterest, reddit, tumblr, twitter)

medium.description: Type of traffic, value: 'organic' (from search engine)or 'social' (from a social network)

source.description: Traffic source, value: name of the search engine or social network

actions.title: getUrls
actions.description: Executes a query and returns a paginated response

actions.title: getUrlsAggs
actions.description: Query aggregator. It accepts multiple queries

actions.title: getUrlsDatamodel
actions.description: Gets an Analysis datamodel

actions.title: getUrlsExports
actions.description: A list of the CSV Exports requests and their current status

actions.title: createUrlsExport
actions.description: Creates a new UrlExport object and starts a task that will export the results into a csv. Returns the model id that manages the task

actions.title: getUrlsExportStatus
actions.description: Checks the status of an CSVUrlExportJob object. Returns json object with the status.

actions.title: getUrlsSuggestedFilters
actions.description: Return most frequent segments (= suggested patterns in the previous version) for a Botify Query.

actions.title: getUrlDetail
actions.description: Gets the detail of an URL for an analysis

fields.description: comma separated list of fields to return (c.f. URLs Datamodel)

actions.title: getUserProjects
actions.description: List all active projects for the user

actions.title: getSavedFilters
actions.description: List all the project's saved filters (each filter's name, ID and filter value)

actions.title: getSavedFilter
actions.description: Retrieves a specific saved filter's name, ID and filter value

actions.title: getProjectUrlsAggs
actions.description: Project Query aggregator. It accepts multiple queries that will be executed on all completed analyses in the project

nb_analyses.description: Max number of analysis to return
